div.h1:
Powerful & Friendly MRP-ERP
for Malaysian Manufacturers
div.h2:
Built On World’s Top Open Source ERP Engine
Localised With Local Manufacturers’ Best Practices

div.p: Anywhere, anytime, any device - access the system on cloud with internet browser
The different apps for different teams are integrated - no more duplicate entry or checking.
Smart automation & powerful tools to help your team save time on routine & checking
Beautiful modern software design & interface (web 2.0) - easy to learn & use

div.div: Powered By The World’s No 1 Open Source ERP
div.p: MRP/ERP is one of the most difficult softwares that requires solid robust back-end technology. Our software’s engine is not scrambled locally from scratch, but a world-class framework founded by Belgium’s Bill Gate, Fabien Pinckaers. The system is used by more than 2 million users and giants like Toyota, Danone etc.

div.h2: From Quotation to Order And Follow Up

div.div: Auto convert to sales orders (with a click)
Flexible Sales Orders (modify DO, sell kits, ship partial orders)
Invoicing from SO (Invoice, manage payment terms & follow up)
Flow to/from Related Teams (Create MO & DO)
Flexible Sales Orders (modify DO, sell kits, ship partial orders)
Invoicing from SO (Invoice, manage payment terms & follow up)
Flow to/from Related Teams (Create MO & DO)

div.h2: Improve Inventory Performance, Easily Manage Suppliers

div.div: Forecasts of product availabilities - check stock, purchase, incoming & demand (SO)
Set purchase rules for each product’s suppliers for new PO
Define product info for sales (warranty etc) & accounting
Comprehensive master list with detai (address, contact & financial)
Summary of biz transactions for each supplier
Pricelist (rules/conditions for prices to automatically apply on purchase by suppliers)
Fast RFQ with Calls for bids to manage multiple RFQs, compare & order
Flexible PO (A click from RFQ; approvals; merge; multi-warehouse)
Monitor orders by status & keep track of incoming by batch
Create invoice/payment from PO with a click; upload actual invoice later
Monitor & control orders with dates in future

Not a set product.
But a service that keep on developing what you manufacturers need.
